column5: I have been using the Yum Dinger for a few years now but i am now going to give the Gary Yamamoto senko a try. What color's should i consider trying? For the Dinger i like the 5" WATERMELONSEED, and the 5" BUBBLE GUM/LEMON SWIRL.
The conventional wisdom is that you should match your bait's colour to the bottom where you are fishing.  Natural camouflage will turn the bait fish, crayfish etc. to the same colour as the bottom.
Watermelon, smoke with purple flake. Those are my go to. Match the bottom.
green pumpkin with gold and purple flake fav senko by far!!
Dark green with red flake...might be watermelon or something?  SLAYS smallies
My favorite is watermelon with green flakes
